name: Castlevania Chronicles III: Dracula's Curse
summary:
A fanmade remake of Castlevania III: Dracula's Curse by studio WarMachine.

Experience Castlevania III like never before!
Enhanced visuals, mechanics, and new abilities such as item crashes, updated spells and forms, fully remastered OST, and much more!!!

"Do you have what it takes to face me?!"

It's always better to play with friends, and this time you get to keep ALL your partners along the way!
